title: How to Edit a Yelp Review: An Easy-to-Follow Guide

steps.title: Go to the review you want to edit.
steps.content: Go to the review you want to edit. You'll see your reviews listed by clicking your profile picture and then going to About me > Reviews . [1] X Research source If you're using the Yelp mobile app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad, tap Me , scroll down, then tap Reviews under "Contributions." On Android, you'll also want to tap the review you want to edit.

steps.title: Click ••• or the pencil icon on the review.
steps.content: Click ••• or the pencil icon on the review. You'll see one of these two options on the review. You can skip this step if you're using an iPhone or iPad.

steps.title: Click or tap Edit review.
steps.content: Click or tap Edit review . This will take you to the review you'd like to edit from the area dedicated to managing your reviews. If the option to edit the review is no longer available, you can remove the review and write a new one. Just click the trash icon on the review or tap Remove Review to get started. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Make as many edits as you need to.
steps.content: Make as many edits as you need to. Don't forget to spellcheck, grammar check, and do whatever it takes to make that review better.

steps.title: Click Post Review or Post.
steps.content: Click Post Review or Post . This saves your edits to the review and shares them on Yelp.
